title: Leblanc is such a great design.
body:
Gets stomped in lane still one shots.
Wins lane One shots
8/2 kha still can't outdamage having 12k dmg while lb has 16k.
Not to mention all her kills were basically at the end.After getting completely stomped in lane by fizz.

Good thing we have idiot proof champions.Great counterplay I mean we all have flash every 10 seconds to survive her 1 shots.

Update - For everyone saying she needs "skill" her combo isn't skill. Point and click Q easy to hit w and you can't miss E if you are in their face. 
Although it might take skill to be FAKER level, doing her combo is not skill, it's easy and cheap. Same with yasuo he is easy to play. To play him at a god-tier level that's skill. Picking up a champ that's already easy enough isn't skill. 

Right now leblanc 1 shot is so straight forward its easy, maybe doing other things requires skill but not her combo. I'd say she does require great "skill" in the higher elo where things are harder. But that doesn't me she is hard to play at lower elos or hard to perform is braindead combo. You can't say a champion is difficult when you aren't doing the difficult part, you are doing the easy part.

If it looked like you needed more than 2 brain cells to execute her 1 shot i'd be fine with it.But it's the easiest combo.YOU NEED FLASH TO COUNTER IT, unless you have a dash or something to get out.  Lastly I get that she is an assassin but when she is fed you can't make 1 mistake or half your health if not all gets deleted. While throughout the whole game lb can make 50 mistakes and take it all back with a push of a button, Her passive or her ult and if all fails she will probably still kill you since her damage is absurd.

People gotta stop rewarding such troll comments like this

I cannot play LeBlanc at all.  I am just incapable of pulling off the things I see others do.  She also scales very poorly; people saying she "one-shots" when behind are thinking "they lost lane so they're useless" regardless of how many items they've actually built.  Once an assassin has three items, they can solo kill a squishy; regardless of whether they were ahead or behind, they have three items.  That's also true of burst mages.  You aren't gonna have the defenses to survive that anymore.  The fact a champion isn't *literally completely useless* after losing lane is actually good design; players should still have agency throughout the game, even at times when they should be at a disadvantage.

I agree she lacks counterplay, though.  Laning is hell, lol

The "they lost lane so they are useless" thinking on LB is majorly a fault of LB players themselves, who use it as an argument awfully often. If I only had a penny whenever someone defended LB by saying "she falls off like a rock, don't feed her kills early and watch her be useless after 20 minutes" I'd have enough money to buy Riot and delete LB.

The idea of "falls off like a rock" doesn't literally mean she's useless after 20 minutes.
A non-ultra fed LeBlanc against half competent team finds kinda hard to delete a squishy pass 30 minutes because even if you can snap back with W if you didn't kill their ADC you're virtually useless for a while. 
And still, you need to be in danger zone even for a few seconds to be effective.

Let's not forget that dumb QR poke was deleted (30/70 damage now) when Riot un-reworked her.

Of course, as a LeBlanc main, I understand Distortion is a very strong ability but idk is not like it is totally uncountereable or something. Is not release Xin Zhao by any means. She, indeed, feels oppresive when ahead but practically any champ in the game can feel like that.

Support player. Makes sense. Learn how to land your CC and you'll instantly stop complaining about Kat.
You don't hit D3 by not landing your cc. How about you stop with your victim complex? There's evidence enough that Kat isn't weak and doesn't need buffs.
I meeeean....the entire subreddit stating that she's not fun should be enough to realise that she needs some positive attention, whether it be through QoL changes, buffs or a complete revert.

Oh no, a bunch of Katarina mains complaining about Katarina not being in the spotlight. Obviously we should ignore all empirical data and just make random changes to the champion for no apparent reason outside of "unfun", which is entirely subjective based on who's bitching today.

I mean if a champion just straight up isn't very fun even for the people who play the champion, that champions could probably use some changes.  Definitely not buffs, but ideally some power-neutral changes.

Much easier said than done though.
Unless you want Katarina out-right Aatrox'd, you'd probably just leave well enough alone, cause this constant complaining for unneeded changes is how Aatrox's work got turned into a VGU.
You mean because old Aatrox players don't like new Aatrox or something?  I mean he really is a very different champion now, but I'd generally call it a successful VGU.

No. Riot had made significant changes to Aatrox's passive and Q before he got VGU'd. What did people do when they did those? Ask for MORE changes. Eventually Riot just VGU'd him outright.

If a champion has a power appreciation problem, that IS a design issue. If these guys want Kat to stay the way she is, they shouldn't make it seem like Kat's a bigger issue than she is.
So you're saying that a video **game** shouldn't be fun? Well, that's one warped perspective you have right there.

It should be fun, but fun is subjective.

You'll have more fun when you finally focus on your champ and your play and less on what others have and how cool they look in comparison to you. I hated playing Sona when I started realizing how boring and lazy her design is in comparison to the newer supports, so I dropped her for a newer support I could have fun on. It's not a balance issue (for solo queue, anyway), it's an "experience" issue. Don't coat your subjective feelings on fun as a balance issue.

Again, I'm going to say that it's not fun to play a champion that relies entirely on playing around delays....and then boards says that she's not close to if not the slowest champion in terms of burst. 

My subjective feelings on fun are a balance issue since fundamentally this current Kat is broken, not OP broken, just broken and only works in dream scenarios. If you disagree with me that's fine, however I do think she needs a shit ton of bugfixes and QoL changes before she can ever be truly fun.
